content.detailedDescription:
My family and me visited downtown cleveland on this day and took several pictures from downtown.  we ate lunch and stopped at edgewater park and took more pictures, several of downtown cleveland.  nothing unusual was noted that day, weather was perfect.

on review of the days pictures several containted unknown objects.  the earliest was at 11:23 am  from near the rock and roll hall of fame and included a docked ship, the mather.  this is the earliest photo to have some unknown objects. 

most of the objects are in the photos from edgewater.  the best includes one in front of a building which gives you a good idea of scale.  the last photo taken that includes anything was at about 1:24 pm.  two different cameras captured the same object.
content.summary: Nothing was seen that day but on reveiw of pictures unknown objects seen

content.detailedDescription:
i was driving in union city, tennessee, on a sunny spring day around noon sometime in the mid-1990's. (it's hard for me to remember the exact date. i think it was sometime in april of 1995, but it could have been 1994 or 1996.) i had been running an errand for my boss and was on my way back to my workplace in a nearby city. while waiting at a traffic light in union city, i suddenly noticed an extremely bright light in the sky in the direction that my car was pointed (toward the south). the light was white in color, small, round, and, seemingly, stationary. it was not blinking or twinkling and there was no other light near it. i could not hear any sound from it, but i was in traffic which could have masked a sound (assuming that it made one). i know that it was not the moon or an effect from the sun. it was not directly overhead and not near the sun. it seemed to be very high in altitude. there was not a cloud in the sky, so i had a perfect view of it. i was able to watch it for a few minutes, as the traffic light was taking a long time to turn green.
 
     my first thought was that it must be an airplane, but i was puzzled by a few things. if it was a plane, why would the pilot turn on one bright light in the daytime? the object was not low enough in the sky to land, so i wouldn't think that it was a landing light. also, the light was not blinking and not red in color, as is usually seen on most aircraft. and, even though it seemed small in size due to its distance from me, it looked somewhat bigger than the usual lights that you see on aircraft.
 
     as i was wondering about all of this, the light suddenly disappeared! it was as if someone had turned off a light switch. another strange thing was that i could not see a shape of a plane (or anything) when the light went away. if it was a light from a plane and it was close enough that i could see the light, wouldn't i be able to see a shape or silhouette when it went off? there was nothing there but clear blue sky! to be clear, the light did not streak across the sky or trail off like a meteor, so i know it wasn't that. it simply disappeared. 
 
     the traffic light finally turned green and i went on my way back to my job. i never saw that light or any light similar to it again. i had expected to hear something about this on the local news later, but i didn't hear anything about a light in the sky. no witness reports, no mention of meteor showers, no reports of storms in the area...Nothing. i only told my brother about the light and no one else, for fear of ridicule or someone just dismissing it as an airplane. (my brother is more accepting of mysteries like that, whereas most people just look at you strange if you tell them something like this.)
 
     i have read many reports of ufos in books and magazines over the years, but that was the first time (and, so far, the only time) that i saw something strange myself. i never found out what that light was and i still wonder about it from time to time.
content.summary: Sighting of white light during daytime

content.detailedDescription: We looked at the pictures later and saw a bright spot above the third  palm tree from the left.
content.summary: My wife took 3 pictures within 30sec..The object appeared on only the second pic.

content.detailedDescription: I was travling in a car and then all of the sudden i saw a large tear shaped thing traveling  above my head.  i stoped the car and looked up and then all of the sudden the thing stoped and hovered.  the thing hovered for a little while and it looked a little greyish and silverish. a blinding light came out and then my car started to shake.  this happend for a few minutes and then it stoped.
content.summary: Was traviling in car and was then abducted by an alien

content.country: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
content.detailedDescription: Gsgsgsgsdgcxgdgdsdgsgds
content.summary: Gs

content.detailedDescription:
This is an account of a ufo sighting that i had in approx. mid june of 1986. the time and date are not exact as this occured over 20+ years ago and i am going from memory.

i was in jackson county michigan,traveling east on ann arbor rd. at around 10 pm est. in the summer or 1986. i notice an object in the night sky.It appeared to be a cluster of small red lights that seemed to be hovering or traveling west,in the distance to the east.It didn't look normal,so i decided to see if i could get a better look.I proceeded down the road about 1/3 to 1/2 of a mile. i continued to view the object as i traveled east on ann arbor rd.I finally came to where ann arbor rd.Ended and the highway on-ramp to enter (i-94 east) started. there was a fork in the road near the highway on-ramp and where a road,(knight rd.)merged. there was a small turn-out there.I turned right and i parked in the turn out area.I exited and stepped away from my vehicle,continuing to view the object.

the object was spherical in shape and black or dark in apperance,nearly blending against the night sky.It had what looked to be multiple, maybe 20 red lights spaced evenly across it's surface.If it hadn't been for the lights i probably wouldnt have noticed it at all.It's elevation was approx.500 ft.And it's distance was approx. 1/4 mile away.It travled slowly from east to west in a straight line.It seemed to almost paralell the highway on it's course.I dont remember the object having any particular noise,but there was a faint humming sound.The sound could easily have been from the vehicles traveling on the highway, as it was much closer than the object.I continued to view the object until it faded in the distance to the west.

the object never changed in it's course,speed or apperance during my observation.It just seemed to be out for a cruise.

i have never before or since saw anything resembling this object.


i have attached recent,(may 2010) daylight pictures of the area where the sighting occured just for general reference.
content.summary: The object appeared as spherical and solid with many small red  type lights

content.detailedDescription: A number of us were outside on our deck that has an unobstructed view to the east. my wife and her neice noticed several object that look at first like airplane moving in a northerly direction. we can see plane all the time approching the portland international airport but these objects looked a little differant. at first 2 looked to rise from the horizon and then several other followed what look like the same pattern or direction. chris works at the airport and call one of her fellow empyoee to see if there was any air traffic at the time. he report only two aircraft in the area. we saw 10-12 lights rise and move north. we think we saw ufo's over portland.
content.summary: Multiple objects rising and moving north

content.detailedDescription:
We were on a big dock looking out at the water of pearl harbor, and it was dark.  on the other side of the harbor, there was another dock and the dark silhouette of a tree next to it.  just above this tree there was suddenly a blue light.  it looked like it was just floating but moved around in a sort of circular, random pattern and sometimes changed to white.  it didn't seem to follow an exact pattern; it looked like it was drifting or floating.  it disappeared behind the tree for a few seconds, and then it came back into view for another minute.  it was not very high but just above the tree.  it changed from blue to white a few times and got brighter when it changed to white. it disappeared behind the tree again and did not return.

we did not think it looked like anything that we recognized, like an airplane, because it seemed very floaty. we could see no shape like a craft, just the light.  we have been living on air force bases most of our lives and have never seen anything else resembling this.  it wasn't unsettling at all, just fascinating.
content.summary: Floating light changing from blue to white

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on broadway heading to work (between arapahoe and mineral) i work 3rd shift. i first noticed it coming over the tree line from the sw heading ne towards dia.  but it could not have been more than 500' up to low for dia,and heading the wrong way for centenial.  as it was aproaching i turned down my radio and roled the window down all the way. heard nothing (there was trafic noise though).  as it was passing over broadway in front of me i realized there were no windows on it. the wings on it were not shaped like conventional ones they seemed to come out to a point and the tail section looked way to small for the "plane". the fuselage was long and thin. i also noticed no exauhst.The feeling i had was i have seen this before then it hit me,the utah aircraft mystery. not exactly like it but very similar.  my best gues was it was a 100 to 150 feet long i lost sight over the tree line to my left snd behind me.  upon reflection it could have been coming from the air force acadamy.  a drone?
content.summary: The "plane" had no windows

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from school, i was on a high over pass and noticed a redish, orange ball of light thinking it was an airplane ailing toward portland's airport. it was moving slowly, so i thought it was a helicopter, then i saw another behind it, i thought two airplanes, both reddish, orangish, moving from se to nw, toward airport and perpendicular to holgate, the road i was on. when i saw two more i stopped the car on the top of the over pass, putting my flashers on to watch it. the color was not like an airplane, i thought of fire, or flares. i had an unobstructed view of entire sky line. then 4 more showed up, again in a line, like airplanes in a holding pattern. there were so many, i counted about 10 and had to move my car because of traffic, i pulled to a side street and continued to see them between buildings. parked and watched the first three that i saw them change direction and appeared to fly up and into the clouds, the middle one became faint, we had high cloud cover and i could tell it was going up into the clouds and the other two went as well. the rest, when i looked were gone as well.

my feelings: first i thought airplane, but the wrong color..Wondered if i saw a blinking light, but it was not a blinking light  it was an irregular redish, yellowish steady light, maybe a little, flicker. then i thought there were too many, i felt uncomfortable, called my daughter, which is why i know the time. i was also uncomfortable because the horizon was clear and then it was filled with these objects.

action and motion. irregular formation of a line, with irregular spacing between objects, moving in se to nw direction, then 3 went up.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 1 then 2 then several, i counted 10, objects moving over portland, lined up like a holding pattern for airplanes moving from se to nw, then moved up.

content.detailedDescription:
on satuarday evening may 15th 2010 approx 9:15 i was  walking north east one block west of bellmore ave i noticed a reddish dark orange ball in the sky moving south east of bellmore ave. i followed it about one block south when it appeared to stop over a house then it dissapeared.
 i then went back one block north then turned right {north east)
when i observed two more balls one following the other comming from the north going south.I went and got my mother,and the two of us observed the two balls from our back yard treaveling south.When the first one dissapeared two more balls appeared from the same direction as the first two and went south .This happened maybe three times for a total of eight or ten objects they were moving kinda slow and each pair were evenly spaced apart the balls were dark orange and red swirling around inside.It looked like an orange red liquid marble of fire. at some point i decided to get my video camera but by time i got back outside the last one was gone.
  we waited and watched for about 15 to 20 minutes but there were no more balls.
  we went in the house and in total disbeleif what we just saw 
wanted to report it but didnt know where to call.
  after a little while i went home{directly across the street from my mothers house where the second sighting took place}
  i realized i needed milk so i went back to my mothers house to borrow a glass of milk, as i crossed the street i looked towards the direction the balls were comming from....And there was another ball going in the same exact direction as the others.So i ran in the house and got my video camera and managed to get about thirty seconds or so of the ball.
attached is a copy of the footage, the video looks a bit different
then it did with my eyes it may have been because of the settings on the camera 
 the date and time setting on the camera is incorrect i have not erased the original  video in the camera or changed the settings 
so if it's necessary to test the camera.
 please feal free to contact me for any questions

                  thank you
[cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Wittnest 8 to 10 orange red balls of fire

content.detailedDescription:
ufo  sighting  may 17  2010
i mowed two yards this even after work.  the grass was a little damp, because it rain two hours before i started mowing.  after i got done mowing the two yards. i loaded my commercial mower on my trailer and went home. after i got home.  i drive my mower off of my trailer and pulled it up to my carport.  i raised my mower with my hands and put a  jack stand  in  front of my commercial  mower to hold the front of it up so i could wash the wet grass off of my mower after i got done washing the grass off of my mower i had to clean up the wet grass it was getting dark so i got my flood light and turn it on so i could see better.
i took a shovel and started shoveling the wet grass up and carrying it across the road and throwing it over in the woods i happen to look up. i thought i was looking at a star then i saw a plane going toward the star then the star started to move away from the plane then the object vanishes while i was looking up at the object but the plane keep on going if flew over when the object vanish.
content.summary: I was walking toward the road i spotted a ufo hovering then it took off

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on a bench in fron of my house at about 8:40 pm talking to my mother (in idaho) on the phone.  by this time it was a very clear, dark evening, no clouds, and about 8o degrees.  the stars were very bright and i even mentioned to mom about the bright sliver of moon and the very bright star venus off to the west/northwest of home.  while talking to her i then looked almost directly north and saw a very bright light about 3-4 miles north just east of a peak called picacho peak heading almost due south in a direction that would take it about a half to full mile just east of my house.   it was a very bright, 5-8 times larger than venus to the west, and and had no other color other than bright white.  i first asumed that it must be a plane or a helicopter, because of the "pinal airpark" that is about 5 miles south of us.  i then realized that there were no blinking lights of any kind, just a constant star-like bright white, and it was absolutely silent.  sounds carry for miles in the desert air, but there was none from this object that was approaching at about the same speed that a small private airplane would be traveling.  i told my mom that i was watching something weird and wiuld have to get my wife chris to see it also. the light was then beginning to pass just east of the house (paralelling i-10 freeway).  i rushed into the house, told my wife, and we rushed out the back of the house to the back yard and watched it pass over just east of us--all the time never blinking or making a sound.  it never changed altitude, or veer east or west.  it seemed to head in a direct north to south line though it actually seemed to slightly "flutter" as it moved--it wasn't totally smooth in flight which seemed strange because airplanes do travel "smoothly".  my wife commented also that there were no blinking lights or any noise.  i told her to rush inside to get our daughter who was in her bedroom, and while she was inside, i watched the light, all of a sudden for the next 2-3 seconds, rapidly grow smaller, though by no means less bright, untill it just blinked out entirely.  it didn't go out because of disappearing in the far distance, because it was still within 1-2 miles of my house.  the light just shrank in size until it was just a very bright pin-point, and then it went out.  no sound was ever heard.  within about 4-5 minutes, an airplane with blinking lights flying nearly the same speed and the same southerly direction flew by, and both my wife and i could clearly hear its engine.  i have no idea what we saw, but the whole time i was also talking to mom on the phone.  she got quite an earful.
content.summary: Watched bright  light approach my house absolutely silent  from 2-3 miles north until it "blinked out" about 1 mile south

content.detailedDescription: At 1:30am the morning of may 5, 2010, i was travelling home from a friends house.  while travelling south, i observed a bright light moving in a curved fashion across the sky between the trees.  from the road, i used my forefinger and thumb and found the light was about the size of a quarter and fairly far off to the south.  it appeared to be moving inside the clouds as it was not a sharply defined orb, but fuzzy around the edges much like aircraft lights seen through the clouds.  upon traveling furthur south along the roadway and my view was no longer obstructed by the trees around me, i discovered a second, then a third and finally a fourth, identical, orbs.  the lights all rotated clockwise in a circle around an arbitrary point.  after one and a half rotations, the four lights stopped momentarily and converged to a central point.  at the central point, the four lights again paused for a moment, then returned to their positions and proceeded to rotate, again, counterclockwise.  this pattern continued until i lost sight of the occurance as i travelled west.  my first thought was that the lights were spot lights coming from the downtown area.  the lack of any apparent column of light that would be visible from a spotlight soon dispelled any thought that they were spotlights.
content.summary: 4 lights moving counter-clockwise in a circle, stop, converge into one, diverge and repeat the process.

content.detailedDescription: A very nice thunderstorm was moving to south of my place with a beautiful lighting show. i grabbed the camera and went out on the deck and started taking photos, in the hopes of catching some lighting with my windmill in the photo. the tip of the storm was about two miles south of me. after the stormed had moved off for my perfect shot, i scanned through the photos and found this! i never saw it with my own eyes just caught it in a photo. it was not in any other photos i took that time. let me know if you know what it is....Thanks!
content.summary: Found on a photo i took.......

content.detailedDescription:
hello,
my name is paul e. i���m writing this because i have witnessed an event that i would like to share. i will be holding back some of what i witnessed so i can verify if anyone else has seen what i saw.  it was late november, 2009. it had just turned dark outside. i was sitting in our back screen room. when i saw a small blinking light about 8 feet away in the grass. my first thought was it was a lightning bug, but i live in tampa florida and i have not seen one since i moved here in 1984. i also noticed that this light was bright white not yellow, as is a lightning bug. the flash duration was about one second on , 5 seconds off. and as i watched it was moving toward where i was sitting. i tried to figure out what was causing this, looking around for anything that might be reflecting off of something in the grass. but as i watched, it just kept flashing and moving in what would be slightly to my left. as it came closer, lets say about 6 feet away i still could not make out what it was. i stood up and moved to the corner edge of my screen room (where our dog had tore the screen) and leaned out looking down. i was at this time only about 3 feet from the light when it stop flashing and began to get brighter and brighter. baffeled at what was happening. i stared  at this thing that began to roll around like it had flat sides on it. i still could not make out any shape to the object. i leaned down as close as i could without falling trying to see  something, as i did this, it began to vibrate very fast. so here i am leaning out of our screen room watching as a very bright, very small (maybe 1 quarter of an inch)  light no more than 36 inches from me. i didn���t know what to think, then (heres the good part) i could see some kind of a square outline in the middle of the light, and then all of a sudden it shot up into some type of a portal within maybe 4 inches off the ground, and it was gone. needless to say i could not believe what i had just witnessed.  because the portal (lack of anything else to call it) slowly dissolved. dripping some sort of metal like fluid. which dispersed before hitting the ground (this is where i am going to hold something back.) since this happen, i was consumed by what had happen, so much so i had to try and draw this, and i didn't do that well. i have attached a low res file.          my question to you. craft, entity or device? and where the heck did it go? has anything like this been reported before?
ps.  one more thing, scifi shows do not do this justice.
content.summary: Very small light warps into a portal. witness from 3 feet away.

content.detailedDescription: In recent years, i have been awakened at night, roughly 2-3 a.M. about once every 5-6 months apart. i always have this sort of panic feeling when it happens. i usually first hear a sort of snapping sound. just the other night i heard it again. in my mind���s eye i saw an operating room, and a fuzzy vision of figures standing around what seemed to be an operating table. when i opened my eyes i ���m still in the bedroom, all lights were off, everything seems normal. but a bright light was showing through the window blinds. this bedroom in on the second floor. i looked around and caught something moving in the air. it was very hard to detect. i noticed this sort of wavy motion in the air. i kept starring into the dark to try to catch what was moving around. i noticed this type of a scanner moving very slowly over me and my boyfriend. i could barely see it. it was like a hologram, but i could see this circuitry, very thin wire with a tiny light moving following the wiring. it moved over my head, over my body down to my feet then it shifted over my boyfriend, same pattern. it did not make any noise. and like i said i kept  loosing sight of it but then would catch it in my visual field. i wish i had something i could have thrown at it to see if it would bounce off of it or go through it. i got really frightened and screamed, when i did that the light went out and the scanner vanished immediately. i did not tell my boyfriend of this as i know he would think i am crazy. he was not aware of anything, he sleeps very soundly and it���s difficult to wake him.. this seemed to be some sort of scanner for a lack of a better word. it was like stealth. are we being scanned by an intelligent life? what is going on? have you heard of this? i can say more things like this have happened to me in other places over the past 5 years. but i never saw this scanner before.  can you tell me if you have heard of this type of event??
content.summary: Bright light shining in 2nd story bedrm window, scanning device hovering over me.

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i where driving home and saw a light above a small mountain . so we stoped to look at it and as soon as we did it started to come right at us. it flew directly over us wisper quite at about 200 yards. it was boomerang shape and silver like the inside of a soda can and had a red and a blue x on the bottom center of ship. as it started to turn slightly traveling away from us , what looked like a star came out of the center rear and head towards us and stop in the sky , and just stayed there as the craft got alittle futher away another ( star ) came out the rear and stayed in the sky as the ship flu away. we got back in the car and headed towards home , same direction as the mountain we first saw it,, and it was right back there doing whaterver it was doing ?????? we where a little scared but mostly amased
content.summary: Silver with blue and red x on it

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend was watching some sports on tv in my livingroom i have a great view from there of the river and out of the dark we both at the same time got distracted from the tv set to a green light outside in the pitch dark night it was obvious it had greenish light triangular it dropped down a few feet like a drop of rain  we both looked at each other askin if we saw that. felt like omg what just happened what was that we both ran to the window and stared for 10minutes but it had desappeared. im writting this months after because i cant get the feeling and image out of my head me and my friend.
content.summary: Triangular green lights dropping  like a "rain drop" from high in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my bedroom taking photos to the sky and mountains because the sun and the cluds were making a beautiful landscape: the sun was shining and at the same time there were clouds forming a storm.
i didn't know that in several photos a green light appeared until i watched them late at night. this light appears in the same point but in different positions; it is green and oval.
i didn't feel anything because i didn't see it at the exact moment but it isn't the first time this happens to me. two years ago, i took a photo to the sky and immediately something reflected in the sky. when i checked the photo there was a white oval light on it. i lost this photo but that is the reason i want to know what is this and i hope you can give an answer.

thank you.
content.summary: Green light

content.detailedDescription: I am hoping someone else saw this saturday night. i was at a birthday party and around 10:30 we were all on the front porch of a my friends house in ft. wright kentucky and someone there pointed i think it was the southwest direction and we saw hundreds of pulsating lights going across the sky. it looked like a plane would look at night but there were hundreds of them. it was a cloudy night so they were definitely traveling under the clouds pretty slowly across the horizon. we lost sight after they traveled behind the treeline across the street. after the majority of them were behind the treeline we would see a couple here and there trailing behind. i have never in my life seen anything like that before. i have been searching on the internet to see if i can find anything on it but have not had any luck. i e-mailed the cincinnati observatory but have not gotten a response from them either. i know i am not crazy. everyone else at the party saw it too. if anyone has any answers, please let me know. it is driving me nuts. i tried to take a video with my phone but it did not work. thanks for your time.
content.summary: Hundreds of pulsating lights going across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I left my home at 11:45 am or so to walk to the greenwich library that opens at 1pm on sundays .94 miles from my home. weather was 70 degrees farenheit with blue skies, partly cloudy-a beautiful day. three quarters of the way to the library is the presbyterian church on putnam ave at the top of greenwich ave. at lafayette place with a green bench and kiosk in front on the street facing south and greenwich ave. i sat down checked my watch (12:08) to determine how long i could sit and enjoy the sunshine before the library opened. i turned my face upward to the sun, i had on dark sunglasses. to the right in my field of vision i noticed a thin white contrail approximately 4 inches long traveling from my right to left above the clouds. it was traveling very fast and what was creating the contrail could not be discerned it was just a thin fast moving white line. i watched it travel across my field of vision for a few seconds before i realized what is wrong with this picture? the contrail was not changing merely moving across the sky from my right to my left above me (my head was angled up)it did not lengthen and disperse change color or intensity that i could see with the naked eye as the contrail moved across the sky. as i continued to watch there was a brief flash of silver i could make out it had shape as if the object had banked briefly then righted itself. a short time after it made a angled turn (contrail)west,upward and away until it disappeared. have no idea what it may have been maybe a new aircraft unknown as yet to the general public. shortly after it disappeared i noticed a jet flying considerably lower and slower flying north over my head. i then rose and continued walking west on putnam to the library. i do not consume alcoholic beverages.
content.summary: Strange contrail brief silver flash very high in the sky

content.detailedDescription: During the afternoon of may the 15th 2010 a few friends of mine took some pictures of this strange formation in the clouds. they said that this long cylinder formation did not seem to be moving and after about 5 minuets or so slowly dissipated. from their description of the event it did not sound as if it was some kind of craft but i found the pictures so interesting that i wanted to find out if this is a naturally occurring event. so far i have not been able to find anything like it. take a look at the pic and see for yourself.
content.summary: Strange atmospheric event

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were out for a short walk after dinner in our neighborhood when we both stopped in the middle of our conversation.  we both looked up and saw this circle of light moving slowly across the sky.  obveiously we believed it was some sort of airplane and so we both stopped to take a listen.  all we could hear was the buzzing noises of an air conditioner.  we live right beside the airforce base.  to make you understand we know the differences in the noises of an airplane.  my husband has also first hand experience because he works on aircraft.  to conclude my story i had to add that information so that its understood that both of us have never encountered anything of this sort.  the "aircraft" was low hovering above the tree tops almost looked like the brightest star in the sky.  this object appeared to be roughly 300 feet above the tree tops.  we never heard a noise of an aircraft engine and then it dissapeared shortly after a car drove past.  i personally don't know what to make of this considering i truely never believed in this sort of thing.  after this experience i'd truely love some real answers.  i only wished i had a camera/mini dvd.  thank you for taking the time to read my post.
content.summary: Floating object that dissapeared slowly

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were out for a short walk after dinner in our neighborhood when we both stopped in the middle of our conversation.  we both looked up and saw this circle of light moving slowly across the sky.  obveiously we believed it was some sort of airplane and so we both stopped to take a listen.  all we could hear was the buzzing noises of an air conditioner.  we live right beside the airforce base.  to make you understand we know the differences in the noises of an airplane.  my husband has also first hand experience because he works on aircraft.  to conclude my story i had to add that information so that its understood that both of us have never encountered anything of this sort.  the "aircraft" was low hovering above the tree tops almost looked like the brightest star in the sky.  this object appeared to be roughly 300 feet above the tree tops.  we never heard a noise of an aircraft engine and then it dissapeared shortly after a car drove past.  i personally don't know what to make of this considering i truely never believed in this sort of thing.  after this experience i'd truely love some real answers.  i only wished i had a camera/mini dvd.  thank you for taking the time to read my post.
content.summary: Floating object that dissapeared slowly.

content.detailedDescription: Small suburban area,pop.3000.Monday.(totara park)(google satelite haylock grove for plot&scale)at 800ft....14deg.85%hum.One eighth cumulus to west.Nil wind.Broad valley floor.High surround hills,river(hutt),tracks southwest to exit wellinton harbour,20ms away. event one 1055hs. while mowing lawn,extremly large "tumbling,white-silver,bluish,gelatinous,milky deflated ghost balloon-like,exeptappears almost suborbital,atleast 10-20 ms long""oozes"at 30,000ft.Airliner speed,east to west.Appears luminous on vacating west.Straight track. ...Main event 1100hs. faced east,toward mountain range.(rimutaka range)observed fast approaching orange/brown/yellow churning cloud(1.5msaway)base 200ft.Cloud advances westward to my loc.,passes over head,dissapears instantly when followed to west,vis.Viewed to east again,complete east/southeast/northeast vision filled with 300ftcieling clockwise slowlychurning blue/grey mist flatbottom (disk)small embedded silver/vividblack approx 8,rotating with "mist"(looked like sperm under microscope)(had tails)...Temperature has dropped few degs.Looked around,&back,yes,its real.Deadly silent,no ambient noise..Petrified.Estimated 1.5-2mis.Wide,position rocksteady,stillrotating,i am on the western edge of it.1102hs. looked east&verticaly,discovered massive 3mile high glacier type sided "top"to the "disk",this part is rock steady,not turning.Consists of "shortcropped"iceblue "vapour",has spaced"lobes"(2)bulging from side,that i could see.1103hs.Observing southeast"wall"300ft.Section twtches&glitters silver&vividblack,coarse vivid black highdefinition structured "intertwined"muscles appear through surface "mist"to surface,&"opened",birth port of sorts.A matariel erupts,and proceeds to"rapidly extrude"outwards toward me(range 1500ft)inote also avividly flashing"goo"with extending&retracting"fingers"fussing about arround on the "surface"around the "port".The emerging entity,heading toward me,now reveals itself to be a superslick streamlined prehistoric,slabeyed,cobra snake,no scales or plates,graphite/glass texture.No mouth.I start to experience internal body heating,floating,i then feel asensation of knowing what this entity is,(report continued furtherform)part one.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 1055hs.Object.1..1100hs.Main event,2mileswide,3mileshigh."auto distributor.Cap"

content.detailedDescription: We just left a concert on the north side of indy. we were grilling out in the parking lot when we noticed this orange firey ball moving on a path from the ne to the sw. it was silent, but low enough you should have heard some sound. the color seemed to pulsate from bright orange to white orange. the description and photo and video of the ohio sighting on the same night is exactly as it appeared to us. i asked a group of people next to us what it was, no one could explain. in all about 8 or 9 of us watched it move across the sky under the clouds and disappear to the sw.
content.summary: Orange firey ball exactly as ohio report shows in photo and video.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving west on the i-10 freeway moments from entering i-8, as the sun set, i gained sight of the crescent moon and slightly north west to it, was the planet venus. 

at around 8:30, 8:45.. i could see what would looked like "star dust" seemingly emitting from venus in two trails in a 45 degree downward trajectory, headed by a very small  blinking white light. this "object," from my point of observation, was moving at a very slow pace. the light and trail so faint, barely visible to plain eye. 

from the north, a white/blue light was shooting across the sky in a jagged flying pattern. sometimes the light would disappear for a second, reappear above the moon, disappear again and reappear moments later in a position below the moon.. all the while heading south until disappearing behind the landscape. 

by this time i had entered the "phoenix bypass route" which is where the i-8 meets up with 85 north heading back up to i-10 w. it was just before 8:55 pm.. i just made the switch onto the 85 north.

what looked like a flare being "shot out of" venus, and also at a 45 degree angle, started gaining acceleration towards the ground. as the "flare" flew closer to the earth, it appeared to change in color.. ranging from bright white.. to pinks and finally a white-blue. this streak of light.. or this "fireball," also appeared to be growing larger and brighter as approaching the ground.

i remember feeling like i was about to see a spacecraft crash into a field just to the north of me. i remember preparing myself for the "impact." before the object touched down, i stopped my truck short in the middle of the freeway and did a 180 degree turn, with the intentions of following the object for the rest of its voyage.

just before it hit the ground.. the object leveled out in a seamless motion, and it shot across the terrain... a white fireball (the light smaller now), and in a "zipping" like motion, this object hovered and glided gracefully above the ground before disappearing behind some nearby desert terrain.
content.summary: Flare like, color changing.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the all day doppler radar for channel 9, when i saw in a movement of the radar a bright ball of light flash huge it was just above the k in apopka on the match if you can rerun it, just as a lighnting strick hit in the same exact spot at the same time a bight red streak of light came out of the ball covering 3 counties, just north to deland. now if that wasn't strange enough the next time the radar past the red streak had turned green at 7:13 on the time. it is now 7:14 pm and the bright round light still has the streak but its red again and the ball has a red circular edge now. commercial.......Ok its back on and they've zoomed in on radar and its gone. i'll search online now, bye
content.summary: Bright white light in thunder storm with red beam shooting out on doppler

content.detailedDescription: I never took my mother for a big fan of science fiction, so naturally when i found a copy of whitely streiber's transformation amongst her belongings, it raised some questions in me, it wasn't until i was old enough to appreciate the potential reality of the phenomenon that i became intrigued enough to ask her about why she had this book. as i can understand it, she had bought the book in an attempt to make peace with an incident that occurred before i was even alive. this is an account of that story that has been relayed to me on multiple occasions with absolutely no discrepancy over the years by my parents who to this day are shaken up about their close encounter of the second kind. on the evening of early june 1984, my mother and father joined some family friends at their summer place in cape cod for dinner. everyone has finished their meal and by now are sitting outside within a terrace facing a lake. the couple my parents had come to visit has a young son about seven years old who because it was around 11 o'clock was being put to bed by the wife upstairs. it was then that my mother, father and the husband of the couple were outside conversing when out of nowhere an all encompassing sound of bass that seemed to surround them as if they were placed within a bubble began to sound. my father recalls it reminded him of "someone smashing metal objects clanking up against a garbage dumpster with a sledgehammer". my mother was four months pregnant with me at the time and recalls saying out loud "just go away, please don't hurt my baby". she recalls an immediate onset of life ending fear followed by a wave of calm, which in her own words she suggests was her "acceptance of going to the other-side", referring to the afterlife i assume. after about 30 seconds of this unbelievable sound, it stopped whereupon my father noticed what he described as a "silver flying saucer with six or so windows" hovering in the sky". i asked him for a frame of reference how far he estimated it was and how big it might have been and he states that it was just over the lake and with the moon visible in the sky, perhaps 100 yards away, making it in his own estimate between 40 o 50 feet in diameter, but couldn't say for sure. he recalls the husband counting out loud on his fingers from 1 to 9, before the craft moved from a completely stationary position to shooting off into space, and within in an additional few seconds had completely disappeared. the strangest part is yet to come; when the wife of he couple came back downstairs to rejoin the group, she found a room of stunned people. she asked what was going on and thinking she was joking my mother replied "yeah right, very funny", or something to that decree. she hadn't heard a thing. this made no sense. she was upstairs putting her son to bed and had absolutely no experience to any affect whatsoever. i continued to probe my parents with questions about this incident for years to come. first of all they were miles from any town or civilization, a private dirt road through the forrest being the only means to which once could reach the house., so the possibility of some earth terrain vehicle is easily dismissible, especially since the sound came from directly overhead and seemed to surround them. there was however a military base somewhere in the town in which they tried to contact the following morning to ask if there had been any test flights to which they said there hadn't been. whether this craft was man made, or of extraterrestrial origin and even charted on radar is another mystery. the aftermath of the incident was unfortunate. the husband of the couple my parents went to visit was a man of intelligence and concrete thinking as he taught philosophy at a prestigious university. after this incident, he refused to speak one word about it to my parents dismay who at the time were trying to make some sort of sense out of it. he refused to accept the reality of what had happened as i can imagine it shook the foundation of he world around him tat he had come to know and accept. the couple and m parents stopped being friends after that night and haven't spoken since. to this day i am fascinated as to what might have happened with the craft considering i was in developmental stages of being formed, and what they might have wanted to do.
content.summary: Metallic disc shaped craft seen following deep bass sound  heard over house in cape cod, massachusetts during the summer of 1984.
